title: Leave A Trace
lyrics:
Neoui heunjeog-eul ttalaseo
Naui heunjeog-eul namginda
Leave a trace
Leave a trace
Neoui geulimja ttalaseo
Naui geulimja geulinda

Draw your shadow

Draw your shadow

Jigeum eodilo ganeunjin molla

Geunyang neoege ganeun gil-ila

Jogeum witaelobjiman idaelo

Neoui gieog-eul chajneunda

Neoui gieog-eul ttalaseo

Naui gieog-eul chajneunda

Find a memory

Find a memory

Jigeum eodilo ganeunjin molla

Geunyang neoege ganeun gil-ila

Jogeum witaelobjiman idaelo

Neoui gieog-eul

Jal moleugess-eo gieog-i najil anhjanh-a

Angaega kkin geoscheoleom heulishageman boyeo

Nega tteooleujil anhjanh-a

Nega tteooleujil anhjanh-a

Nega tteooleujil anhjanh-a

Nega tteooleujil anhjanh-a
